subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Acronyms and Abbreviations
msgSnippet: ... In the case of internationally understood acronyms, I think we should do what Japanese and Chinese do, and use the Latin script for them. -- Even the best
messageBody:
Ron Cameron scripsit:

> Any thoughts some sort of standard?

In the case of internationally understood acronyms, I think we should
do what Japanese and Chinese do, and use the Latin script
for them.

--
Even the best of friends cannot John Cowan
attend each others' funeral. cowan@...
--Kehlog Albran, The Profit http://www.ccil.org/~cowan
